Name: Pepin Rivero Special
Ingredients: 30 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of chocolate powder rim.
Review: White chocolate come coconut ice-cream, only vaguely rescued from fluffiness by gin spirit.
History: Created by Constantino (Constante) Ribalaigua Vert at the Floridita bar in Havana, Cuba. This recipe is adapted from a 1937 Bar Florida (later renamed Floridita) menu. The name refers to Pepin Rivero, who took over the Cuban El Diario de la Marina newspaper upon the death of his father Don Nicolas Rivero in 1944.
Nutrition: One serving of Pepin Rivero Special contains 203 calories
